import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react'; const PizzaCount =()=>{ const[smallPizzaData, setsmallPizzaData]= useState(0); const[mediumPizzaData, setmediumPizzaData]= useState(0); const[largePizzaData, setlargePizzaData]= useState(0); const[childrenData, setchildrenData]= useState(0); const addChildren =()=>{ setchildrenData(childrenData+1) setsmallPizzaData(smallPizzaData+1) if(childrenData>0){ setmediumPizzaData(mediumPizzaData+1) } } const removeChildren =()=>{ if(childrenData>0){ setchildrenData(childrenData-1) } } const addSmallPizza =()=>{ setsmallPizzaData(smallPizzaData+1) if( smallPizzaData > 0){ addMediumPizza() } } const removeSmallPizza=()=>{ if(smallPizzaData>0){ setsmallPizzaData(smallPizzaData-1) } } const addMediumPizza =()=>{ setmediumPizzaData(mediumPizzaData+1) if( mediumPizzaData > 0){ addLargePizza() } } const removeMediumPizza=()=>{ if(mediumPizzaData>0){ setmediumPizzaData(mediumPizzaData-1) } } const addLargePizza =()=>{ setlargePizzaData(largePizzaData+1) } const removeLargePizza=()=>{ if(largePizzaData>0){ setlargePizzaData(largePizzaData-1) } } return(

P Pizza Cart

Total

Total {((smallPizzaData%2)*150)+((mediumPizzaData%2)*200)+(largePizzaData*300)}

 ) } export default PizzaCount;
